name: Pip Pop
description:
LUCKY BOY SUNDAY One sunny Sunday in August 2007, Camilla and Camilla sat down on a bench near the lakes of Copenhagen, shook hands and promised each other they would create their own version of a child's reality. They wanted the feeling of that lucky Sunday to be a part of the products together with edgy design and top of the pop quality. The collections are produced in Bolivia by very talented women. Lucky Boy Sunday supports these women by giving them a good job for a fair price.

Materials: 100% baby alpaca & 100% polypropyl filling
Washing Instructions: 30 degrees on a wool program
Size: approx 15cm

name: Linen Cushion
description:
Mix and Match this plain linen cushion.

Our range of versatile plain linen cushions are designed to be mixed and matched with our selection of printed and embroidered cushion, providing you with endless combinations. When used alone they can provide a wonderful burst of colour to liven up any room of the house.

Materials: 100% Cotton lawn and 100% feather insert
Washing Instructions: Cold machine wash
Colours: Hot pink, Acid, Orange
Sizes: 35cm x 35cm, 45cm x 45cm, 50cm x 50cm

name: Liberty Cushion in Meadow print
description:
LIBERTY OF LONDON

Mix and match this classic Liberty of London tana lawn cushion.

The fine, high thread-count fabric is wonderfully silky smooth to the touch, making this the perfect cushion for cuddling up to. We've used the print on both sides with the cushion itself beautifully finished with an invisible zipper. The timeless appeal of Liberty of London prints makes this the perfect choice for the home.

All Liberty designs receive a name, as befitting their distinctiveness. In the early days of the store this may have been the name of a printer who cut the blocks of that particular design, like Mr Cole who cut Coles Daisy or in the 70s a collection with exotic names such as Turmeric, Cinnamon and Coriander.

Materials: 100% Cotton lawn and 100% feather insert
Washing Instructions: Cold machine wash
Print: Meadow by Liberty of London

name: Red Toadstool Lamp - Small
description:
Heico lamps often feature in the coolest international design magazines. These whimsical and functional statement pieces look like decorative objects by day and give off a warm, reassuring glow by night.

Material: Thermodynamic moulded plastic and comes with a 12v 10 watt globe
Colour: Red and white
Size: 28cm

name: Red Toadstool Lamp - Large
description:
Heico lamps often feature in the coolest international design magazines. These whimsical and functional statement pieces look like decorative objects by day and give off a warm, reassuring glow by night.

Material: Thermodynamic moulded plastic and comes with a 12v 10 watt globe
Colour: Red and white
Size: 30 x 35cm

name: Castle
description:
FLATOUT FRANKIE A flexible four room castle for princesses and knights. Striking white graphics inspire decorating and creativity. Pop it up to play, flat pack it to store or travel with. Available in recycled natural kraft board with graphics.

Dimensions: 60cm x 45cm x 60cm

name: Dolls House
description:
FLATOUT FRANKIE A flexible four room home for all dolls - big and tiny. Striking white graphics inspire home decorating and creativity. Pop it up to play, flat pack it to store or travel with. Available in recycled natural kraft board with graphics.

Dimensions: 60 cm x 45cm x 60cm

name: Little Aeroplane
description:
FLATOUT FRANKIE A strong aeroplane featuring slot in side and tail wings. Jump in, hold onto the side grips and fly high into the sky. Additional little holes allow the little pilot to add shoulder straps and to pin and make a propeller (straps and pin not included). Striking white graphics inspire decorating and creativity. Pop it up to play, flat pack it to store or travel with. Available in recycled natural kraft board with graphics.

Dimensions: 77cm x 30cm x 78cm

name: Little Cook
description:
FLATOUT FRANKIE A strong little oven ready to cook up a feast of creativity and play. A shelf inside, holes to poke tea towels into and a hook to hang oven mitts. Signature white graphics inspire decorating and creativity. Pop it up to play, flat pack it to store or travel with. Available in recycled natural kraft board with graphics.

Dimensions: 35cm x 24 cm x 30cm
